com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLShaderUniformsType

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JCGLShadersType

    public interface JCGLShaderUniformsType
    The interface to setting uniforms in shaders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void shaderUniformSetActivityCheckingEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable checking that a program is active when attempting to assign values to uniforms.
      void shaderUniformSetTypeCheckingEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable checking of the types of assigned uniforms.

    • Method Detail

      • shaderUniformSetTypeCheckingEnabled

        void shaderUniformSetTypeCheckingEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable checking of the types of assigned uniforms. Type checking is enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true iff type checking should be performed.

      • shaderUniformSetActivityCheckingEnabled

        void shaderUniformSetActivityCheckingEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable checking that a program is active when attempting to assign values to uniforms. Activity checking is enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true iff activity checking should be performed.

      • shaderUniformPutFloat

        void shaderUniformPutFloat(JCGLProgramUniformType u,
                           float value)
                    throws JCGLException,
                           JCGLExceptionProgramNotActive,
                           JCGLExceptionProgramTypeError
        Upload the value value to the uniform u.
        Parameters:
        u - The u variable.
        value - The value.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL error occurs.
        JCGLExceptionProgramNotActive - Iff the program to which the uniform belongs is not active, and program activity checking is enabled
        JCGLExceptionProgramTypeError - Iff the program uniform is of the wrong type, and type checking is enabled
        See Also:
        shaderUniformSetTypeCheckingEnabled(boolean), shaderUniformSetActivityCheckingEnabled(boolean)
